          <title>
            <string language="ca">Mid-way Test - level 2</string>
            <string language="en">Mid-way test - level 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittlerer Test - waagerecht ausgerichtete 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai intermédiaire - 2 de niveau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste intermediário - 2 nivelados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova intermedia - 2 Livelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρισκόμενη στη μέση του δρόμου δοκιμή - επίπεδο 2</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Test del segon nivell de la Virtual Language School. Conté diversos exercicis per avaluar competències gramaticals, lectores i de vocabulari.</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual Language School second level test. It includes various exercises for assessing grammatical, reading and lexical competence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">anàlisi de text</string>
            <string language="en">textual analysis</string>
            <string language="es">análisis de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtueller Test Stufe der Sprachenschule zweite. 
Er schließt verschiedene Übungen für das Festsetzen 
grammatisch, das Ablesen und lexikalische Kompetenz ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai virtuel de niveau d'école de langage 
deuxièmes. Il inclut de divers exercices pour l'évaluation 
grammaticale, la lecture et la compétence lexicologique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste virtual do nível da escola de língua 
segunda. Inclui vários exercícios para avaliar gramatical, ler
e competence lexical.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova virtuale del livello della scuola di lingue
seconda. Include le varie esercitazioni per valutare 
grammaticale, la lettura e la competenza del lessico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονική δοκιμή επιπέδων γλωσσικού σχολείου δεύτερη.
Περιλαμβάνει τις διάφορες ασκήσεις για την αξιολόγηση της 
γραμματικής, διαβάζοντας και λεξικολογικής ικανότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
